00058 #define Usb_send_event(x)               (g_usb_event |= (1<<x))
00059 #define Usb_ack_event(x)                (g_usb_event &= ~(1<<x))
00060 #define Usb_clear_all_event()           (g_usb_event = 0)
00061 #define Is_usb_event(x)                 ((g_usb_event & (1<<x)) ? TRUE : FALSE)
00062 #define Is_not_usb_event(x)             ((g_usb_event & (1<<x)) ? FALSE: TRUE)
00063 
00064 #define EVT_USB_POWERED               1         // USB plugged
00065 #define EVT_USB_UNPOWERED             2         // USB un-plugged
00066 #define EVT_USB_DEVICE_FUNCTION       3         // USB in device
00067 #define EVT_USB_HOST_FUNCTION         4         // USB in host
00068 #define EVT_USB_SUSPEND               5         // USB suspend
00069 #define EVT_USB_WAKE_UP               6         // USB wake up
00070 #define EVT_USB_RESUME                7         // USB resume
00071 #define EVT_USB_RESET                 8         // USB reset
00073 
00074 #define USB_MODE_UNDEFINED            0x00
00075 #define USB_MODE_HOST                 0x01
00076 #define USB_MODE_DEVICE               0x02
00077
